name: edgily
content:
edgily adverb
(NERVOUSLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a nervous or worried way: "We need to go now or we'll be late," he said edgily. We were having lunch and edgily trying to get to know each other.
More examplesFewer examplesWhat's going on?" she asked edgily.She hovered edgily between tears and laughter.The minister edgily insisted that the report was not true.
